text:
THREAD 👇

The fighting in Yemen has left some  𝟮𝟰 million Yemenis - more than two-thirds of the population - to rely on some form of aid.

The @UN warns that more than 30 of its 41 programmes could close in weeks as COVID-19 & cholera continue to spread https://t.co/6K382qZfJE https://t.co/bNdcFsefk7
